content: knitted top in drops safran piece is knitted bottom up with lace cables pattern e-359 yarn group a **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio 200-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 01 desert rose **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
